respStmt.name: Emilie Savage-Smith

G. J. H. van Gelder

editorialDecl.p: This record created following the Syriaca.org guidelines. Documentation available at: http://syriaca.org/documentation.

interpretation.p: Approximate dates described in terms of centuries or partial centuries have been interpreted as documented in Syriaca.org Dates.

category.catDesc: The name used by Syriaca.org for document titles, citation, and disambiguation. These names have been created according to the Syriac.org guidelines for headwords: http://syriaca.org/documentation/headwords.html.
An anglicized version of a name, included to facilitate searching.
The name used by e-Ktobe as a standardized name form.
A person who is relevant to the Guide to Syriac Authors
A person who is relevant to the Bibliotheca Hagiographica Syriaca.

langUsage.language: Unvocalized Syriac of any variety or period
Names or terms Romanized into English according to the standards adopted by the Gorgias Encyclopedic Dictionary of the Syriac Heritage

revisionDesc.change: CREATED: person from spreadsheet https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1ujiT91ua3sA-WX86OWpuE-gDD_E-zONpI1dP70pXdWw/edit#gid=0. The canonical record is currently in the spreadsheet. Changes should be made there. THIS FILE SHOULD NOT BE MANUALLY EDITED!

person.note: Hippocrates, Greek physician 1.1; 1.9; 2.1.5; 4.1; 4.5.3n; 5.1.37 no. 46; 9.31n; 10.1.14 no. 129; 10.37.2; 10.37.5 nos. 10–13; 11.5.10; 11.5.25 nos. 117, 163; 11.6; 11.8.4; 11.17 no. 3; 13.1.3 nos. 10, 12; 13.24.3(p); 13.51.1; 13.51.2; 14.21 no. 2; 14.25.2; 14.25.7; 14.25.9 nos. 21, 26, 28, 29, 50; 14.32.4; 14.54.6 Hippocratic works specified: 3.3; 4.9.1 (list of twelve main works); 4.9.1.2 (list of other works); 9.11; 10.64.20 no. 6; 11.16 no. 3 (`Aphorisms`); 10.64.20 no. 7 (`Prognosis`); 11.5.25 no. 16311.17 nos. 3, 4; 11.18 no. 3; 13.51.4 no. 1 (`Oath`); 11.17 no. 3; 13.51.4 no. 2 (`Aphorisms`); 11.17 no. 4; 14.21 no. 2; 14.22.4.3 no. 44.7; 14.22.4.3 no. 44.14; 14.22.4.3 nos. 44.7, 44.30; 14.25.9 nos. 26, 28, 29; 14.54.9 (`Prognosis`); 15.1 no. 53; 15.10 nos. 1, 2; 11.17 no. 3; 14.54.3 (`Aphorisms` and `Prognosis`) 15.30 no. 4; 15.40.9 nos. 37 ( `Aphorisms`), 38, 39 ( `Acute Diseases`); 15.47.3 no. 4; 15.58.8 no. 4; 15.60.1 (`Aphorisms` and `Prognosis`); ＡⅠ.1 no. 1 Cited in poetry: 5.1 (al-Maʿarrī), 8.30 (Isḥāq ibn Ḥunayn), 13.24.3 (Saʿīd ibn ʿAbd Rabbih and Aḥmad ibn ʿAbd Rabbih), 13.58 (Abū l-Ṣalt Umayyah), 14.32.4 (Yūsuf ibn Hibat Allāh), 14.51.3 (ʿAḍud al-Dīn ibn Munqidh), 15.8 (Abū l-Faḍl ibn al-Milḥī), 15.10 (Ibn al-Budhūkh), 15.17 (Abū l-Ḥakam al-Maghribī), 15.37.4 (ⅠＡＵ), 15.52.1. (ⅠＡＵ, two poems); ＡⅠⅠ.1 (Anon); ＡⅠⅠ.15 (Ibn ʿUnayn)
